short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Effortlessly collect and label AI data while earning crypto rewards!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Meet the PublicAI Hunter plugin, your ultimate AI-powered promotional tool and data annotation assistant! This user-friendly Chrome extension allows you to seamlessly leverage your personal device's computing power to automatically annotate data while promoting PublicAI.
Transform your social media interactions into valuable datasets and earn crypto rewards just by staying logged in! With Hunter, you can invite friends to join PublicAI and utilize powerful social media promotion tools. Simply click reply on trending posts, and our tool will automatically generate promotional messages for you. Every effective invitation earns you generous rewards!
